name: Purrfect Stacking (Windows Only)
description:
Stack the objects on top of the cats and fill a row with cats for them to knock the objects over!

Move the blocks with A and D key and make then drop faster by pressing ENTER or SPACE key.

You gain points for stacking objects on top of cat blocks and finishing a line with only those cat blocks. 

Couldn't place only cats in one row? Clear that row by just finishing the line with any kind of block. 

But keep in mind: points are only granted for all-cats-rows with objects on top.

So with all that said: Happy stacking and knocking stuff over!
